column1: HELLO THERE ! THIS BOT JOINS Google Meet AUTOMATICALLY BY IMAGE RECOGNITION AT SCHEDULED TIME WITH THE LINK
column2: IF THERE ARE LESS THAN 10 PEOPLE IN THE MEETING
column3: IT WILL QUIT THAT MEETING AND JOIN THE NEXT MEETING.

column1: IT ALSO MUTES YOUR MIC AND DISABLES VIDEO BEFORE ENTERING THE MEETING.
CHECK IF YOUR PC IS 64-BIT OR 32-BIT FIRST BY GOING TO "THIS PC or My Computer" and right click -> properties
you can see it there. ( if your system shows 64-bit processor
column2: 32-bit OS then you need to install 32-bit softwares)

column1: THE CHROME BROWSER MUST NOT HAVE DARK THEME !!!!! SET IT TO DEFAULT THEME!!!!
DOWNLOAD THIS TO FILE AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS GIVEN BELOW (https://bit.ly/3lOm53e)
INSTALL GIT BASH (download the setup file and just keep clicking yes till the installation finishes)
https://git-scm.com/download/win (DOWNLOAD 32bit or 64 bit depending upon your pc)
Clone my repository by opening git bash FROM START MENU (follow the instructions given below)
YOU CAN OPEN GIT BASH BY GOING TO START MENU AND TYPING GIT BASH
COPY AND PASTE THE CODE BELOW
THE FOLDER NAMED 'gmbot' MUST BE DOWNLOADED IN YOUR DESKTOP NOW
COPY THIS FOLDER TO YOUR C DRIVE AND PASTE IT
WATCH THE VIDEO ATTACHED BELOW FOR INSTALLATION AFTER DOWNLOAD (important)
WATCH THIS VIDEO ON HOW TO INSTALL PYTHON AFTER DOWNLOADING THE ABOVE SETUP (Very IMPORTANT) https://youtu.be/DKXMUGuGMp4
WE NEED PIP INSTALLED(follow this tutorial)

column2: RIGHT CLICK AND SAVE IT ON DESKTOP.
CLICK IT OPEN ( YOU NEED TO INSTALL PYTHON BEFORE DOING THIS)
OPEN GIT BASH FROM START MENU AND TYPE

column1: AFTER THE INSTALLATION IS DONE TYPE FOLLOWED BY ENTER KEY
AFTER THE INSTALLATION IS DONE TYPE FOLLOWED BY ENTER KEY
AFTER THE INSTALLATION IS DONE TYPE FOLLOWED BY ENTER KEY
AFTER THE INSTALLATION IS DONE TYPE FOLLOWED BY ENTER KEY
GO TO THE FOLDER NAMED 'gmbot' IN YOUR C DRIVE
OPEN THE FILE enter.csv IN NOTEPAD
YOU NEED TO ENTER THE MEETING DETAILS LIKE I HAVE SHOWN YOU IN THE THREE EXAMPLES IN FILE enter.csv
YOU WILL HAVE TO CHANGE THE LINKS AS PER YOUR SCHEDULE

column2: MY BOT WILL AUTOMATICALLY JOIN THE MEETING (enter the timings and LINKS correcrly in enter.csv)
IF THE TERMINAL WINDOW ABRUPTLY CLOSES YOU WILL HAVE TO FOLLOW THIS VIDEO (https://youtu.be/mrz6Q0-HyKo FROM TIMESTAMP 0:13)

column1: YOU NEED TO OPEN THE FILE main.py ATLEAST A MINUTE BEFORE THE MEETING STARTS.

column2: it will join the next meeting AUTOMATICALLY by reading the time in enter.csv

column1: the commands might take some time
column2: do not move your mouse or type when running the bot.

column1: IF YOU WISH TO YOU CAN FURTHER AUTOMATE THE BOT BY TASK SCHEDULING SO THAT IT RUNS main.py AUTOMATICALLY using task scheduler.
